answers.question: Telegram Handle We Can Use To Contact You
Link to your Public Group Chat
Have you participated in a previous Gitcoin Grants Round? If so, please name the rounds or link the builder profile associated with previous rounds

answers.answer:
Lighthouse is a perpetual storage system for AI, DePin, and NFTs. 

We have easy-to-use SDKs in JS, Python, APIs with Smart Contracts on EVM Chains like Filecoin Virtual Machine, Polygon, etc. that devs can use to integrate in their apps easily.

Teams rely on Lighthouse to store data on IPFS, Filecoin. We also have threshold encryption SDK to store private data and build token gated dapps with support for web3 wallets signatures, passkeys, etc.
answers.question: Provide a brief overview of your tool, library, or framework. What specific problem or inefficiency in the development process does it address?

answers.answer:
Our SDKs are available in popular languages like JS and Python. Using Lighthouse allows devs to access, store and retrieve on decentralized storage from one single SDK and without need of setting up any complex infra on their own. 

Development time is reduced from couple of days to few hours using Lighthouse SDK. We also provide an easy to use web interface at https://files.lighthouse.storage/ that anyone can use to authenticate and store on decentralized storage.

We also provide a comprehensive documentation on https://docs.lighthouse.storage/lighthouse-1

Many top L1, L2s like Polygon, Astar Network, Cosmos chains, etc. have recommended Lighthouse in their docs too.
answers.question: How does your project reduce development barriers, improve efficiency, or enhance the security of Web3 projects? Please provide specific examples or metrics if available.

answers.answer:
Trusted by thousands of dapps and securing millions of data objects.

- Current users: 19k+

- Files objects stored: 5.5M+

- Data Stored: 6.6Tib+
answers.question: Describe the current usage and support for your tool within the developer community. This could include GitHub stars, downloads, or testimonials from developers.

answers.answer:
We will be allocating funds to scale our engineering capabilities to handle bigger data sizes and potentially 10s of millions of new objects scale into the future.

We are bring new updates to our sdk to improve our upload, encryption flows as well. 

Python is also becoming a goto language for web3 devs because of its agentic use in AI x crypto apps and we want to improve our python SDK to support more functions and capabilities too.
answers.question: Outline your project's roadmap and how the grant funds will be used to achieve your development goals.

For any project deploying smart contracts on blockchain networks, please list all your deployer addresses and their corresponding blockchain networks. Use this format for each entry: [deployer_address], [chain_id]â€”for example, 0x123abc..., 42161 (This represents a deployer address on the Arbitrum network). Please include a separate line for each unique deployer address and blockchain combination.

project.title: Lighthouse
project.description:
Lighthouse is a perpetual storage protocol built on IPFS and Filecoin that allows users to store data permanently. It's the most preferred way for developers to build on filecoin and filecoin virtual machines. 

Lighthouse supports  EVM Chains for payments, signature, authentication and token-gating.

With IPFS content addressing, Lighthouse ensures data immutability while leveraging proof of space-time via the filecoin network to ensure continuous data storage.
